projects.title: Notes Application
projects.description: Single Page Web Application that allows authenticated users to Create, Read, Update and Delete (CRUD) notes.
projects.stack: React, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Firebase

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.description: Single Page Web Application that allows users to look up the weather of a location using data fetched using the Accuweather API

projects.title: Movie/TV Application
projects.description: Multi Page Web Application that allows users to look up the movie and tv information using data fetched from the MovieDB API
